file_content.text: This is Quesh Control to Intelligence vessel.
Your docking permit is approved, but your arrival is unscheduled. Please state your purpose.
Quesh Control--I'm sending you a list of chemical compounds I'd like delivered to my ship.
I need chemical supplies.
I can't help you, sir. I'm not authorized to access our chemical inventory.
I suggest you contact Administrator Kroius planetside. He oversees all chemical warehousing.
Sorry, Quesh Control. I cleared my visit with the Citadel three days ago. I'm here to pick up a cargo of chemicals--sending data.
Check your schedule again?
Confirming. I'm sorry, I don't have you or your cargo listed.
I suggest you take it up with the Citadel or with Administrator Kroius. He oversees all chemical warehousing on Quesh.
Point me to the administrator, and I'll be out of your hair.
I'll talk to Kroius.
Uploading directions now.
I gather chemical mining is one of the major industries?
Tell me about this place.
Incompetent. [Disconnect]
This is Cipher Nine to Quesh Control. I'm here to review the security of your chemical storage units; I expect your cooperation.
This is an inspection!
Apologies, Cipher Nine. I'll inform Administrator Kroius. He oversees shipments from the chem-mines.
I'll expect him ready upon my arrival.
Go ahead.
This is a surprise inspection, Quesh Control. Informing anyone would defeat the purpose.
Keep this a secret.
Understood.
Stay safe, sir. Republic forces are close to the base, and we can't guarantee protection. Quesh Control out.
Forget the administrator. What can you tell me about this planet?
I'd like to know about Quesh.
Quesh is a war zone, sir. We're dying to protect the chemical shipments coming out of here. Republic's doing the same.
Frankly, I suggest you arm yourself. Quesh Control out.
Find the chemicals. Make the serum. You will be free again.
